camera.description: To take photos or record videos within the app, e.g., profile picture or uploads.

location.description: To access your device location for maps, geotagging, and location-based features.

microphone.description: To record audio or enable voice commands and chat functionality.

photos.description: To access your gallery for uploading images or selecting media files.

contacts.description: To read your contacts for sharing, invitations, or syncing address book data.

notifications.description: To send push notifications, reminders, alerts, and app updates.

bluetooth.description: To connect and communicate with nearby Bluetooth devices, e.g., wearables or accessories.
